title: Ultimate Metal
description: Ultimate Metal is the perfect soundtrack for any shooter, action or racing game.
longDescription:
The Ultimate Metal Pack


Ultimate Metal will kick any game's action into overdrive and brings new levels of fist-pumping, headbanging power to any project that needs it.

What could be more fun that ripping through waves of enemies or racing at breakneck speeds? Ripping and racing with heavy metal blasting through your speakers.


Ultimate Metal is the perfect soundtrack for any shooter, action or racing game. With explosive riffs, powerful drums and sounds so heavy it'll crush diamonds, Ultimate Metal will leave your players pumped up and wanting more. If you want fast and furious thrash, riff-heavy hard rock or exotic desert tracks, Ultimate Metal has it all. Hell, there's even a sad song for when the action's over.


Preview: https://soundcloud.com/zhmusic1/sets/ultimate-metal

Trailer: https://youtu.be/pZbFDxiDxow

Playthrough: https://youtu.be/sBKHb9C7puU


For support & comissions visit: ZH Music
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Nine fully fledged, seamlessly looping metal tracks
  • Different styles of metal to suit your needs
  •  Intros and ending stings included for each track
  • Tight heavy riffs for ultimate action.
  •  Professionally mastered to -14LUFS to avoid ear-fatigue.
  • Mixed and mastered to work at any volume (but I know you'll want it loud!)

Number of Audio Wavs: 27 - 9 full tracks, 18 intros and ending stings.

Number of Audio Cues: 27

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1kHz

Does music loop: Yes, except intros and ending stings

Minutes of audio provided: 34:58

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
